ComicInfo.Title: A Revolution in Oz. Chapter Four: Bounty on the Mutiny; Broken Kite. Chapter 5 of Cubs in Toyland
ComicInfo.AlternateSeries: A Revolution in Oz, Cubs in Toyland
ComicInfo.Summary: Planning a visit to Toyland? Here are a few simple rules: 1) Bring your own food. Plastic pies and hamburgers won’t fill you up. 2) Stay away from the tattered, broken toys called the Discardia. They’re dangerous and they’re up to something. 3) If you find yourself in trouble, try to find the Fisher King. He’s the only one who can help you now.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-05 04:14:55. [CVDB341656] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:31:21. [Issue ID 953412]
ComicInfo.Inker: Andrew Pepoy,Shawn McManus,Steve Leialoha,Shawn McManus,Steve Leialoha,Andrew Pepoy
ComicInfo.Teams: Giants,Wolf Cubs,Fabletown Fables,Cardinal Winds,Barleycorn Brides,Winged Monkeys,Nomes,Lilliputians
